A proper village pub. The Blue Boar Aldbourne. Used in the second world war as a base for the American 101st . Band of brothers was based on them

Pub of the past,Bolton.The Blue Boar.'Lost pubs of Bolton'(a fascinating site for those interested in pub history)report that it was 1 of the oldest pubs in town,listed as early as 1779 but closed in 2016,& unlikely to return as it's on a block that may go for redevelopment.

I remember watching a Arsenal United game live in a pub back in 2016.

Completely out of the blue, Arsenal fans started, "WHAT IS TOTTENHAM? S**T. WHAT IS S**T? TOTTENHAM."

Though I agree that Spurs & Levy are pathetic, still, this contrast is unbelievable.
